document_data.mainbody:
orsins Dock was a dock in Suzail in  Cormyr during the late 15 century DR.
In the lead-up to the Council of the Dragon in the , Khaladan Mallowfaer sent two handies, Darlakan and Emmur, to Zorsins Dock, where they would unpack some furniture needed for the council. He later sent Halance Tarandar to go after them, to make sure they didnt break any. Halance, however, was slain on the way to the dock.
